name: 3D FPS - Into The Boss
description:
This is my 3D FPS project.

Modification:

  1.  Added level 3.
  2.  I created a new map.
  3. I modified the levels made during the lectures.
  4.  I added new enemies (more challenging bosses).
  5.  Modified the Speed of the player in level 3. 
  6. The harder Bosses can shoot faster and more accurately 
  7. I changed the in-game music.
  8. I created new environmental props (modified the rocks and added trees)

Credits:

Created by Mai Naor
